actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

official_title: To direct the Secretary of Health and Human Services to provide for increased flexibility in blood donor screening, while maintaining a safe blood donor pool, during times of national or local need.
short_title: Deliver for Our Nation At Times of Emergency Act of 2016

summary.text:
Deliver for Our Nation At Times of Emergency Act of 2016

This bill requires the Department of Health and Human Services to provide for increased flexibility in blood donor screening, while maintaining a safe blood donor pool, during times of national or local need.

titles.title: Deliver for Our Nation At Times of Emergency Act of 2016
